jump_scares.spoiler: Mirroring the final jump scare from the first film, Angela is pulled back into the darkness
After Martos turns around in the apartment hallway, an infected comes running at him
Martos, now an infected, lunges at the camera
Out of nowhere, an infected boy drops down from the ceiling and grabs Larra
The infected boy suddenly jumps onto the priest’s back
When Larra turns, an infected appears in the doorway
An infected girl appears at the end of the hallway
Ori accidentally fires a gun
Ori fires a second shot
An infected suddenly jumps out from the kitchen
Infected Martos lunges at the group
A hand shoots out of the water and grabs the SWAT chief
The creature appears and starts attacking Rosso
The creature suddenly appears behind the priest and attacks him
Angela shoots Rosso
The camera suddenly cuts to the scene from the beginning of the film of Angela being dragged into the darkness
Sick-Head suddenly appears underneath the door of the toilet cubicle that Charly is hiding in
Levon bursts into the toilet cubicle startling Charly
Sick-Head grabs Levon from behind
Sick-Head returns as Charly attempts to treat Levon
Sick-Head suddenly spasms as he lies on the floor
The lady tied to the mattress suddenly moves and cries out
A hand is placed over Venus’s mouth
Doom-Head appears behind Charly

movies.title: A Girl Walks Home Alone at Night

jump_scares.spoiler: During a dream, Tricia approaches her husband who has his back turned to her. He suddenly turns around and is shown to be missing his eyes
Tricia suddenly has a vision of her husband as she closes the door
While lying in bed, Tricia has a vision of her husband kneeling over her
Tricia sees her husband standing behind the lawyer
While meditating, Tricia hallucinates that her husband is beside her whispering in her ear
There is a strange chirping noise in the room next to Daniel and Callie, seconds later a large insect like creature crawls past
As Callie investigates the bathroom, something comes out from behind the shower curtain and the screen goes black
The insectoid briefly appears out of the darkness before the screen goes black again
A shadowy figure passes the window behind James and the camera footage cuts out
An image of James with a disfigured face briefly flashes across the camera footage
A loud bang in an otherwise quiet scene may startle some people
Anne shines the torch on a figure standing in the darkness
An invisible force appears to drag Patient 11 away
Patient 11 suddenly screams and pounds on the observation window
Anne sees a mysterious figure standing by the window
There is a loud bang followed by screaming
Anne shines the torch on Callie who now has black eyes and is vomiting a red liquid
Patient 14 begins to scream and shake violently
Patient 14 suddenly appears in front of the scientist
Anne looks in the car mirror and sees Thomas’s face has turned a red color
A hand grabs Anne around the ankle as she walks up the stairs
Thomas wakes up in the back seat and yells which startles Anne
A researcher gets an electric shock
The corpse on the examination table suddenly screams and grabs the researcher around the neck
Anne looks into a hole built into the wall and a pale face with hollow eyes suddenly appears
Anne looks down a corridor and sees an alien figure coming towards her
Something begins to bang on the door
A hand with long fingers suddenly appears on the locker that Anne is hiding in
Anne turns around and sees a grotesque figure standing beside her
Anne turns around and sees her friends face has the same black eyes and deformed expression as previous victims
Teddy the bear pops up on the edge of the bed
The dollhouse bursts open
A silhouette of a demon appears in the hallway
Benny appears behind the phone
Jack slaps her across the face
After Father Simon says “Now,” the camera pans to the left to show Alan being pulled out of a bathtub by someone and screaming
Alan is suddenly shot in the head
Aaron is startled by Josef while in his car
Josef surfaces from under the water in the bathtub
Aaron pulls back a curtain and is startled by a scary mask
Josef jumps out from behind a boulder and scares Aaron
Josef jumps out of a doorway and scares Aaron as he is entering the house
Josef wakes up suddenly
There is a noise
Josef starts speaking behind Aaron
Aaron is startled by a loud noise while he is in bed
Josef appears in front of the camera and lets out a scream. [Video]
After Sara leaves the toilet Aaron jumps out and screams at her (as a joke)
Aaron attempts to scare Sara again as he jumps out from around a corner
Aaron opens the shower curtain in another attempt to scare Sara however she scares him first by screaming at him while wearing tape on her face
Sarah pops up in front of a window to scare Aaron
Aaron drops the camera at the base of a tree
Sara suddenly runs at Aaron while screaming
A silhoutte runs past the camera
A woman runs out of the darkness and shrieks
Guy’s bloody hand grabs the side of the metro door
Kate looks around the corner and there is a cut to a dog that’s barking at her
Kate touches a sleeping man, frightening him and causing him to bolt upwards
The security guard is grabbed by the killer from behind
Jimmy is grabbed by the killer from above
A dead body rises from the water
Kate turns the flashlight back on and the killer is right in front of the camera. (No accompanying sound.
Zakk surprises Brodie
Rikki suddenly opens his eyes and attacks Zakk and Brodie
Terry, who is now possessed, appears beside Brodie in the bathroom
A bloodied hand bursts through Abigail’s chest
The face of Abigail, who is now possessed, pops up in front of Zakk and Brodie
Uncle Albert, who is now possessed, suddenly appears behind Brodie
An axe head hits the wall just beside Brodie
The kid’s toy begins to yell in an adult voice
There is a loud explosion followed by another about 15 seconds later
A gunshot may startle some viewers
There is an explosion and sparks fly from up ahead in the tunnel
Holly screams loudly
There are several more explosions and sparks fly once more
There is an explosion and more sparks as Holly runs through the tunnel
One of the creatures appears in front of the camera
Two creatures appear behind Holly
A creature appears in front of Holly as she approaches J.P
Another creature appears as Holly opens a door
A clown doll falls from the ceiling with a loud horn
A skeleton reaches through a break in the wall
The female skeleton slams into the chain fence nd starts screaming
A cartoon clown jumps on the screen right at the camera
A woman starts banging on the car door and screaming
The boy is suddenly standing behind the refrigerator
When Gail and Luke are playing the piano, the keyboard lid slams shut out of nowhere
Ruth suddenly appears behind Gail and Josh
Josh suddenly screams
While on the Thunder Mountain rollercoaster, a man’s head hits against a ceiling, becomes decapitated, and flies at the camera
A park guest’s face shifts into a creepy smile accompanied by a sound cue as she walks past the camera
There is a sudden explosion at the Spaceship Earth attraction and it collapses
Mike Myers climbs onto a car roof
A hand reaches through a window to grab lady
A hand smashes through car window
A silhouette watches Laurie walk away from the house
Tommy runs into Myers while at school
Laurie runs into Sheriff Brackett
A window smashes
Myers steps out from a car
Myers appears behind Annie in the car
A shadow crosses the bed while Lynda and Bob are in it
Bob opens door and is attacked by Myers
Dead Bob swings upside down from a door frame
Myers pops up from behind a sofa
The camera rounds a corner to see a clown figure standing in the hallway
A scary-looking clown’s head is suddenly looking straight at the camera
A clown figure is seen standing in a doorway at the bottom of stairs
Bedcovers are lifted to reveal a  girl’s bloody face
The camera turns back to reveal scary clown mannequins sitting on the ground
A black figure standing behind a girl suddenly moves towards the camera, while screams are heard
A loud noise is heard behind him and something briefly flies by the camera
A girl appears laying behind him
The girl turns around to face him
The camera moves to a corpse and the corpse moves its eye
Camera cuts to a dead body
The lights go off and the man sees a dead person appear in front of him
The girl turns the lights off and several dead appear
A hand reaches out from the floor and grabs him
A knock is heard at Seylan’s door, which is revealed to just be a late delivery
Jemma suddenly screams loudly as she claims to have felt something touch her neck
Haley is suddenly dragged backwards in her chair
A loud thud is heard
Emma’s drinking glass suddenly shatters
A warbling sound is heard as the lights in everyone’s rooms begin to flicker
Caroline becomes visible through her virtual background as she appears to fall towards the webcam, knocking the laptop over
Emma’s camera pans down and a floating face filter is seen
Emma’s cabinet doors burst open
Alan’s body falls to the floor behind Radina
Caroline once again becomes visible through her virtual background as she starts repeatedly slamming her head
Haley’s chair gets pulled away
A mysterious face appears in Teddy’s view
Another mysterious face appears in Teddy’s view as loud screaming is heard
Thudding is heard in the distance
Teddy’s flashlight explodes
A scream is heard as another explosion occurs, blowing Teddy backwards
Emma screams loudly after she throws a blanket and it lands in mid-air
A window shatters off-screen as Jemma breaks into Haley’s house
Jemma’s hand reaches for the camera
Haley’s cabinets and drawers burst open
Hayley appears from under the desk as her chair knocks over
As Haley snaps a portrait, a mysterious and bloodied figure suddenly screams and lunges towards her and Jemma, but is then abruptly cut off due to the Zoom meeting reaching its time limit

movies.title: I Am the Pretty Thing That Lives in the House

jump_scares.spoiler: The phone is yanked out of Lily’s hand
Lily turns around and sees Iris watching her from the doorway
Lily catches a glimpse of Polly in the reflection of the television screen
Lily gasps and the reflection of Polly can be seen in Lily’s eye
Accompanied by a high pitched noise, the lamp flickers and the scene abruptly changes
There is a sudden scene change to a man attacking a woman
There is another abrupt scene change
A loud scream can be heard
A torch shines on Susan as she walks towards the camera with an unnaturally wide smile on her face, as she gets closer her face suddenly appears directly in front of the camera. [Video]
A crack of thunder may startle some viewers
There is an abrupt cut to a man hitting a woman
Nikki shoots “The Phantom” several times, his face is then replaced with a disturbing image of Nikki’s own face. [Video]
The face from Alice’s phone footage suddenly comes towards the camera. [Video]
The scene abruptly cuts to a man struggling in a cage trap
After Zepp’s eye is revealed in Daina’s closet, the closet doors slam open
A masked man lunges at Dr. Gordon while he is on phone
A toy begins making laughing noises behind Adam
Adam’s camera flashes to reveal a masked man hiding in a cupboard
Dr. Gordon is electrocuted while he is sobbing on the floor
A hammer crashes through some floorboards
During a suspenseful scene, Rebecca is hit by a teddy-bear
The knife slips, cutting Rebecca’s finger
Rebecca turns around and is startled to see Todd standing right behind her
A screaming face briefly appears on Todd’s laptop
Todd appears in the doorway, startling Rebecca
Rebecca sees a face in her wine glass and screams
A loud bang startles Rebecca
A burnt hand comes out of the folder Rebecca is reading
The camera pans upwards to reveal Francine standing behind Rebecca
There is suddenly a loud flash of several spooky images accompanied by a loud sound effect
Oz has a vision where he sees a clone of himself slowly approaching him. Suddenly, there is a cut to the clone’s face as he begins to scream
There is a sudden flash of Oz’s clone screaming
A loud buzzing noise wakes everyone up
Britton pulls the front door curtain, and a wolf-like creature jumps at the window
Cameron walks towards the corner of the attic and a bat flies out at him
The lights turn back on and a tall monster is standing right in front of the camera
The wolf creature walks away as Cameron gets closer to the car window. Suddenly, it runs back to the car and hits it
The disfigured woman suddenly attacks the TV host
Tara backs into a woman standing behind her
After standing motionless for several seconds, the clown suddenly runs after Tara
Accompanied by a sound effect, the clown suddenly looks towards where Tara is hiding
The clown stabs Tara in the leg
After Tara yells “Mister!”, the clown grabs her from behind
The clown lifts the hammer and lunges at Tara causing her to flinch
The clown again lunges at Tara with the hammer
The pest exterminator turns around and almost walks into a woman standing behind him
The clown (disguised as Tara), suddenly sits up behind Vicky
The clown appears in front of the peep hole that Vicky is looking through
During a tense scene, a mop falls out of a bucket creating a loud noise
The clown suddenly places some plastic wrap over Vicky’s face
There is a sudden cut to Tara’s mutilated corpse
The clown appears through a door and attacks the pest exterminator
The clown reaches through a gap in the doors to grab Vicky
There is a loud noise and the lights start to flicker
The clown grabs the coroner by the neck
Sam jumps on Amelia’s bed
There is a loud thump followed by a scream
Amelia sees the Babadook through the window of Mrs. Roach’s house
The Babadook crawls across the ceiling above Amelia’s bed. [Video]
The Babadook comes down towards Amelia who then wakes up from a nightmare. [Video]
Amelia sees the Babadook through her rear view mirror
There is some loud inaudible talking just before Amelia wakes up
The Babadook stretches out his arms
A hat falls down into the fireplace
Amelia screams loudly at Sam
There is a loud roaring noise as something approaches Amelia
There is a noise from behind a door in the cellar
Scotty jumps out and scares Ash
A branch falls through the window of the cabin
A loud noise startles Cheryl
Ash grabs Cheryl’s wrist as she struggles to get in the house
A branch drops down in front of Cheryl
Cheryl turns around to reveal that her face has become demonic. [Video]
Possessed Cheryl suddenly jumps up and stabs Linda with a pencil
Shelly grabs Scotty around the neck. [Video]
The dismembered hand attacks Scotty. [Video]
Linda opens her eyes and sits up in bed suddenly, revealing she has also been possessed
Scotty grabs hold of Ash, begging for help
Cheryl’s hand comes through the cellar door and grabs Ash. [Video]
Linda attacks Ash with a dagger
Cheryl grabs Ash’s ankle
Linda’s hand comes out of the ground to grab Ash
Cheryl appears at the window
Cheryl pops up again
A pipe in the cellar breaks and blood gushes out
Hands break through the door behind Ash and grab him around the neck. [Video]
Scotty sits up suddenly and grabs Ash
An arm bursts out of Cheryl’s body
A scary figure appears behind a boy. [Video]
Elizabeth suddenly jumps up in bed and screams as Damien touches her
Damien gets into his car and a masked man can be seen sitting in the back seat
A masked man appears behind Jenni and hits her head
There is a loud electronic noise as Elizabeth clicks on the link
Jenni, who is lying in a bathtub full of blood, suddenly begins to convulse as Elizabeth touches her. [Video]
A door bursts open and a masked man stands behind it
Elizabeth opens a door and finds the police officer chained up and dead
Elizabeth turns around and the masked man is right behind her
The masked man attacks Elizabeth once more
There is a loud metallic noise
Elizabeth sees a masked man standing in a dark hallway
Elizabeth runs around a corner and comes face to face with a masked man. [Video]
A vehicle collides with the car Elizabeth is driving
The man touches an animatronic corpse, which suddenly goes off and begins to flail around
One of the funhouse workers turns around a corner and is grabbed by the Rocco the clown
The lights go off, causing the group of girls to scream
As the camera is panning, Dr. Suave jumps out from behind a corner
Mikey and Randall approach a window and Dollface slams a girl against it from the other side
A woman runs up to the car and begins to bang on the window
A funhouse worker jumps out at Laurie and the injured man while they are walking through a hallway
Post credits scene – As the camera pans over several body bags, one of them springs up
Lindsay opens he curtain to reveal Heiter standing there with a gun
During a tense scene Lindsay accidentally kicks a metallic object lying on the ground
Katsuro suddenly stabs Heiter in the foot
Kranz hears a loud gunshot coming from somewhere in the house
The scene jump cuts from Vicki practicing her gun shooting skills to a champagne bottle popping and the sorority girls screaming in excitement
Mrs. Slater’s scares Vicki and her boyfriend making out and uses her cane to slashes the waterbed
Stevie kicks a chain in the dark boiler room beneath the pool and startles herself
As Stevie steadies the swinging lightbulb a hand grab her neck and forces her against the wall
Diane frightens Jeanie in the garden looking for Mrs. Slater
The attic door in the ceiling opens and Morgan screams as the camera rushes towards her
As the Jack-in-the-Box stops spinning the killer runs Mrs. Slater’s cane through her back
Katey is started when she turns around in the attic after discovering a clown costume resembling the Jack-in-the-Box
Diane jumps when an object falls from the van’s dashboard
A hand and Mrs. Slater’s cane come in through the van’s sunroof and attack Diane
Discovering Liz dead in the van, Vicki turns around terrified to see a figure wielding Mrs. Slater’s cane
The murder in the clown mask opens his eyes, and the movie ends
Claire turns around and is startled by Adam
As Adam takes a photograph, a creature appears in the woods
Adam looks up and Colm is standing on the road
The car trunk suddenly slams down on Adam
A shadowy figure moves past a window
There is a high pitched squawk and Adam shoots his gun
Adam shuts the car bonnet which reveals several creatures standing behind him
Something comes through the keyhole that Adam is looking through and pierces his eye
Adam looks through a crack in the door and sees one of the creatures
A hand breaks through the attic floor
Claire looks up and sees a creature at the window
One of the creatures squeals at Claire
Finn’s face suddenly turns demonic
Adam bangs loudly on the door behind Claire
Adam suddenly grabs Claire’s ankle
Cora screams at Adam
A creature stands up behind Adam and impales him through the stomach
During  mid-credits scene, we see the logging truck drive off while calming music plays only to reveal the creature screeching at the camera
When Cecilia flees the house, she runs into a dog bowl after she came out of the room with the suits. Although the bowl is visible, the loud bang is very shocking
After Cecilia gets into the car, her husband runs out of the forest and hits the car window
Sydney is suddenly slapped by the invisible man while talking to Cecilia
As Cecilia tilts the bucket of white paint from the attic, the invisible man suddenly appears right in front of her
After Cecilia turns off the tap in the kitchen and looks around she is suddenly grabbed by the invisible man
The invisible man suddenly appears beside Cecilia under the trunk
The man behind the camera hits the little girl with it
Ed hits the driving man with something
The lights turn on to reveal Ed’s reflection in the window, startling Tim
There is a loud cut to a dead body
One of the workers appears in front of the camera
A sphinx creature runs across the screen while shrieking
A large brick falls on Zahir after he says “What the hell is wrong with you, man?
The sphinx runs across the screen again
The Anubis appears out of the hole and begins to pull the soldier in
The large hanging brick that Holden is investigating falls down
Holden is impaled by the Anubis after he says “We have to keep going.
The Anubis quickly turns toward the camera
The Anubis walks around the corner while growling
Fitzie places his hand over Nora’s mouth
As the camera’s light comes back on the Anubis jumps towards it
The Anubis jumps out of the hole and grabs Nora
After Nora calls out to Fitzie the Anubis crushes his face
As the boy turns around The Anubis jumps at him
Luis spins the camera back around and Deborah is suddenly standing right in front of him
A door slams
Sarah suddenly appears in the room and begins talking to Deborah
Deborah screams into the camera
Deborah suddenly attacks Sarah
Deborah suddenly appears in front of Luis. [Video
A phone rings loudly
A door slams shut
A loud noise startles the group
A loud bang comes from outside followed by several more over the next few seconds
A loud bang startles the group
The television suddenly comes off its stand and slams into Harris
A snake crawls out of the bag
A face can briefly be seen in the window
Deborah suddenly bites the security guard on the neck
Deborah spits at one of the police officers
A window breaks in front of Sarah and Mia
Sarah slowly approaches Deborah in an attempt to sedate her, however Deborah spins around and attacks her. [Video
Deborah opens her mouth in a horribly contorted manner and roars at Sarah
There is a screeching noise as a man in a mask grabs Christian’s face
During a suspenseful scene, the light suddenly turns back on
There is a short scream and the webcam, which was focused on Val, suddenly falls to the ground
There is a loud thud and the webcam moves to Val’s motionless body lying on the ground
There are several seconds of broken video from Ken’s webcam which show a distressed Ken being slammed into the computer desk and putting his hands and face in a blender
Jess’s webcam shows a brief image of her crouching on the bathroom floor screaming. Several seconds later the webcam shows Jess with a hair straightener in her mouth
Hands reach down and close the laptop screen, accompanied by a loud NO!, a few seconds later the ghost of Laura lunges at the screen
A man appears outside the window while the couple in the car are making out
After Caleb says “This was a mistake,” a friend jumps out from the back seat to scare them as a joke
The car is suddenly hit, causing it to shake
Caleb is dragged back in through the window while Tanner and Jessica are trying to pull him out
While Reece is moving closer towards the dead body, Jessica suddenly jumps out from underneath it
The camera focuses on a framed photo for several seconds, suddenly the charred face of a woman appears in the reflection of the frame
The charred woman runs at the electrician
Joe is attacked from behind by another charred figure
A picture falls off the wall, startling Anne
The charred woman grabs Harry
Daniella sees the charred woman in the rear vision mirror, she is then impaled through the stomach
A door slams shut
Paul sees two charred figures in the doorway, he then turns to his wife in bed but there is a shrivelled corpse in her place
Jacob is pushed back on his chair by an unseen force
May is shot in the head as she opens the door and blood splatters onto the camera
A man is impaled through the stomach by one of the charred people
A man is grabbed around the ankle by one of the charred figures
